short_desc: Outpatient services for severely mentally ill children including individual, group, family and sexual abuse counseling. Also provides services for hearing-impaired children
description: Provides outpatient services for children age 17 or under with severe mental health problems. Also provides prescriptions and maintenance of medications. Offers individual, group and family counseling including counseling for victims of abuse, children following hospitalizations for suicidal or homicidal ideation, and special education problems that impact mental health. Also offers parent education classes. Provides consultation services to school.
